summary: In this article, you’ll learn about how you can mint NFTs programmatically using Alchemy and Pinata with 0 Solidity knowledge.
title: How to mint NFTs programmatically
detailed_content: Did you know that the NFT industry generated around $24.7 billion in sales last year(Source)? If you’re a programmer trying to get your hands dirty in this space with little or no Blockchain development experience, this article can be a great start for you. In this article, you’ll learn about how you can mint NFTs programmatically using Alchemy and Pinata Cloud with 0 Solidity knowledge. There are 2 parts to this article:
author: Aaliya Ali
